message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better price anywhere else.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to stay within my budget.

I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I have to make a profit on this deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $11000 for the product. How about we compromise at $11000?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $11000. I'm willing to go up to $10500. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm not willing to go all the way to $10500, Bob, but I can see you're serious about the product. I'll meet you halfway between $10500 and $11000. How about $10750?
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above $10750. I'm willing to go up to $10500. Can you meet me at that price?
I think we're getting a bit stuck, Bob. I'm willing to make one more serious offer. I'll meet you at $10750, but I need to get at least a bit more than that. How about $10900?
I understand you're trying to make a serious offer, but I'm still not comfortable with $10900. I'm willing to go up to $10500, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at that price?
